MBEDTLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA.help: Include support for the TLS-ECDHE-ECDSA-WITH-AES-128-GCM-SHA256 ciphersuites

MBEDTLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA.help: Include support for the TLS-ECDHE-ECDSA-WITH-AES-128-CBC-SHA256 ciphersuite

MBEDTLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA.help: Include support for the TLS-ECDHE-ECDSA-WITH-AES-256-CBC-SHA384 ciphersuite

MBEDTLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CCM_8.help: Include support for the TLS-ECDHE-ECDSA-WITH-AES-128-CCM-8 ciphersuite

MBEDTLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA.help: Include support for the TLS-ECDHE-ECDSA-WITH-AES-256-GCM-SHA384 ciphersuite

MBEDTLS_PSK_WITH_AES_CCM_8.help: Include support for the TLS-PSK-WITH-AES-*-CCM-8 ciphersuites

MBEDTLS_PSK_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256.help: Include support for the TLS-PSK-WITH-AES-128-CBC-SHA256 ciphersuite
